metadata.title: CVE-2023-52821 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/panel: fix a possible null pointer dereference Inversatile_panel_get_modes(), the return value of drm_mode_duplicate() isassigned to mode, which will lead to a NULL pointer dereference on failureof drm_mode_duplicate(). Add a check to avoid npd.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
